title: Venison in blueberry and red wine sauce with leek puree
ingredients: ['700g venison leg', '500ml red wine', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '20g dried blueberries', '6 spring onions, finely chopped', '300ml double cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Puree', '4 medium potatoes', '2 leeks', '50g butter', '225ml soured cream']
